name: Craftsman's Writ - Goblin Sapper Charge
tooltip:
Craftsman's Writ - Goblin Sapper Charge

Deliver 20 Goblin Sapper Charges and the Craftsman's Writ - Goblin Sapper Charge - to Packmaster Stonebruiser at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands.

Requirements:
- Goblin Sapper Charge x 20
